main event: A white oval object was observed traveling east to west at high speed, then disappeared from radar after 2 minutes.
interesting points: The object was observed on ground radar at a velocity estimated between 1500-2000 mph., The observation took place at Misawa Air Force Base in Japan on July 26, 1961., The radar operator was convinced it was a solid object under intelligent control., There were no other aircraft or known objects in the vicinity during the sighting., The observation lasted for about 2 minutes before the object vanished.
